reports.title: Welcome!
reports.query:
This is a demo dashboard for *NeoDash*.
This dashboard will contain some example reports to show off the features of the dashboard builder.
This block is written in **markdown**, so you can add some formatted descriptions.

##### Types of reports:
1. Table
2. Graph
3. Bar Chart
4. Line Chart
5. JSON
6. Markdown

reports.title: Markdown
reports.query:
Markdown also allows you to add images!
![image](https://i.ytimg.com/vi/a6g3QC9-KJI/hqdefault.jpg)

Reports will become scrollable if you add too much text.
Code blocks are also supported:
```
MATCH (n)-[e]->(m)
WITH n.name as name
RETURN name
```

You can also add [hyperlinks](https://p.scdn.co/mp3-preview/f645f6fd2bc040db70d13f0fffc2767411aa47f3?cid=2ed92762388443ba8343683b6452d712.mp3).

reports.title: Latest releases
reports.query:
MATCH p=(t:Track)-->(a:Album) 
RETURN t.name as Track, p as Pattern,a.name as Album, date(a.release_date).year as Released
ORDER BY Released ASC  
LIMIT 53

reports.title: Favourite Artists
reports.query:
MATCH p=(aaa:Artist)<--(a:Track)-->(aa:Album) 
RETURN aaa.name as Artist, p as Pattern, a.name as Track, aa.name as Album, date(aa.release_date).year as Released
ORDER BY Released ASC  
LIMIT 200

reports.title: Most popular genres
reports.query:
MATCH (g:Genre)--(a:Artist)
RETURN g.name as genre, count(a) as count 
ORDER BY count DESC 
LIMIT 20

reports.title: Song energy by decade
reports.query:
MATCH (t:Track)--(a:Album)
WITH date(a.release_date).year  / 10 as year, AVG(t.danceability) as danceability
RETURN year*10 as year, danceability as danceability 
ORDER BY year ASC LIMIT 10

reports.title: Artist popularities
reports.query:
MATCH (N:Artist) 
WITH N.popularity as popularity, COUNT(N) as count
WHERE popularity <> 0
RETURN popularity, count
ORDER BY popularity

reports.title: Drawing paths
reports.query:
WITH [{x:0.1,y:0.1}, 
      {x:0.9,y:0.1}, 
      {x:0.5,y:0.9}] as arr
UNWIND arr as a
RETURN a.x, a.y

reports.title: Playlists
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Playlist)
RETURN p.name as name LIMIT 5

MATCH (a:Artist)--(t:Track)
RETURN a.name as artist, t.name as track, t.preview_url as url
LIMIT 200

reports.title: Similar artists to Stevie Wonder
reports.query:
MATCH p=(a:Artist)-[:SPOTIFY_RELATES_TO*1..5]-(x)
WHERE a.name = $name
WITH x.name as other, min(length(p)) as distance, collect(p) as paths
RETURN other, distance, paths[0] as path
ORDER BY distance ASC

reports.title: Virtual nodes
reports.query:
WITH 
    apoc.create.vNode(["Person"], {name:"Bob"}) as a,
    apoc.create.vNode(["Person"], {name:"Alice"}) as b
WITH a,b, apoc.create.vRelationship(a,"FRIENDS_WITH",{},b) as c
RETURN a,b,c

reports.title: Auto-refresh
reports.query:
WITH
   [
     {x:1,y:rand()},
     {x:2,y:rand()},
     {x:3,y:rand()},
     {x:4,y:rand()},
     {x:5,y:rand()},
     {x:6,y:rand()},
     {x:7,y:rand()}
   ]
as array
UNWIND array as a
RETURN a.x, a.y
